There was an attempt to introduce Reshape in tf.layers at the same time as Flatten, but it was not approved; if I recall correctly this was to limit API surface.

You could use tf.keras.layers.Reshape instead.

body:
There was an attempt to introduce `Reshape` in `tf.layers` at the same time as `Flatten`, but it was not approved; if I recall correctly this was to limit API surface.

You could use `tf.keras.layers.Reshape` instead.
